content: Overall good, but crashes right after saving file. It also has the apps name o. The label which I don't like. The interface is decent. Doing your reference measurements is a breeze. Placing your label is less intuitive until you notice the tiny label on the top left which you have to drag. Next you crop your final image (shouldn't this be done before attaching the label??) and it saves as a photo. However the program crashes right after saving.. But it did save the image.
Used to be a great app. Now I can't get it to run. After you push the button to take a picture, it crashes.
replyContent: We have an update to resolve this coming out very soon. Please email us! ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Best app for target scanning when not using standard targets. Simple, not bloat UI.
Excellent app. 5 stars if you can configure where images are loaded from and saved / exported to by default. GUI is otherwise excellent. Simple and very functional.
App kept closing anytime I tried to do anything. Using on my S20 Ultra...got my refund
replyContent: Hey! Shoot me an email. We have an update in the works to resolve this issue but we will make sure you’re happy: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Crashes everytime I upload or take picture pixel 5
replyContent: Send me an email. We have an update in the works to resolve this issue but we will make sure you’re happy: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: It works great, one thing though...id like to be able to add decimal points when inputing the reference size units. Makes things easier.
Stopped working after three weeks. Tried reinstalling, still didn't work. Needs some serious work.!
replyContent: This is likely due to the recent updates on Android OS. Shoot us an email! We are updating our side shortly! ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Perfect. Everything I was looking for.
Just download.....you will like it.
Useless app for Samsung S10. Cannot upload a picture from gallery. Tried several times to get this app to work but to no avail.
replyContent: Shoot us an email, this is clearly not how it is supposed to function. You can see that from the other reviews. You likely have a permissions issue. Send us an email!

content: Does not export to save groups on Samsung tab. No accessible instructions or troubleshooting except to email and wait for response.
Very good app. It would be nice if it marked center of group on the image

Works OK, it has no recognition built in to detect bullet holes, metric mode does not work very well. Windage and elevation still reported in inches. Overall it works, but you have to redo the setup bits for every photo, rather than per target type
replyContent: Thanks for the review! The auto impact feature is something we’ve considered but it’s hard to get the precision when a shooter stacks impacts. We plan to save time in a couple other areas though for now. The Windage and Elevation is for inputting Offset into a ballistic App, which all speak in inches. I’ll work in better documentation on this!

content: Waste of time and money! Export doesn't work at all, you'll waste a lot of time setting it all up setting the impact points and everything else only to find export doesn't work. The only real option is to export and share for some odd reason it seems able to share with Google drive or Dropbox but not your own devices. It's really a waste of time effort and money you can do better off with a pair of calipers in a pencil.
replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at ballisticxapp@gmail.com? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. I’ve written this response 30 seconds after I got email alert. We are here for our users. Ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Works ok. User interface is pretty good. There's no machine vision to autodetect the holes, so you'll have to do that manually. Also, group size is calculated as the bigger of your vertical extreme spread or horizontal extreme spread, so it's very sensitive to outliers ("flyers"). I don't see an option of x or y standard deviation so you'll have to manually exclude your "flyers."
replyContent: Hey Simon! Stay tuned as we are working on some more options to increase the utility of the App. Soon we will be offering Mean Radius, Rifle Profiles, and a few other tools.

content: I normally love this app but Still not working with importing photos I even uninstalled the app and reinstalled it.
replyContent: Send us an email! Since last update, we’ve not seen this issue: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Update: New version fixes file issue for loading photos. App works well and is intuitive. Would love to see a feature to summarize a large set of shots from across different targets based on point of aim to allow for larger group analysis. Also would be cool to overlay target from different times/configurations/environment.
replyContent: Please try the current release (1.2.3). The recent Android security updates created some challenges for us on the development side and we are sorry for the inconvenience. If you have further issues, email us! Ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Currently not working in pixel 3. Was able to see a photo when taken directly from the camera, but the could not export even though it said the export was successful. Could not use any photos from storage. Update: was able to use a photo from storage and export it successfully to the ballistic x folder in Google photos!! UI is still a little clunky when saving, but the rest of the UI is very intuitive and simple to use.

content: What it does, it does well. The problem is what it doesn't do. Captures images fine, but won't open an image from storage. Allows you to set the reference, but the reference can only be 1 inch. Will allow export of images, but crop function is basically non-functional because you can't grab the handles. Doesn't allow categorization of images by firearm or ammunition. Most of this might be Android 10 issues, but it makes the program too limited to pay $7.99 for. Lots of promise here, though.
replyContent: Virgil! Sorry to hear of the issues you are having. Our recent re-write has a few bugs. Next update and you’ll  have a fully functional App without the bugs. As for the reference size, it is not saving when you change it and hit “X”. You need to tap outside of the field before hitting “X” and it will save. This too will be resolved next update!

content: Not what I needed. I was looking for an app to keep track of my group size across different guns and over time as I practice. I would like to export numbers but this only stores pics. I think I will just measure groups with a caliper.
replyContent: It does Export but we had a recent update that caused a bug. Please shoot us an email so we can resolve your problem! If we cannot, we will be happy to refund you! ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Seemed OK but not exporting anything for me, no pictures anywhere after using.
replyContent: (New update is now available!) Give us a week or so to update this and please check back! The latest re-write has a few bugs we are working on. Thank you! Email us: Ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: The app works great for measuring shot groups but it's pretty limited. The options menu only changes the information in the overlay of the shot group and theres no options for help or changing functionality of the actual app. Like where and how the final product is exported for one. It will say "export successfull" but the export is nowhere to be found. Am i just supposed to take a screen shot?
replyContent: This has been resolved! Please update review or shoot us an email if you are still having issues: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: I really like the app, but there is one major flaw. The app tells me that the image with my calculations on it has been exported successfully, but the image is nowhere to be found. The only way I can save my image to my phone is to share it with someone else, then save it from my messages. This would be a 5 star app if I could choose a destination folder to export my images to on my phone and it actually did expect them to that folder.
replyContent: Alexander, we updated the App and have resolved the export issue. Please give it a go and if you are still having issues, email us: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Since last update there is no way to set 1cm as a reference size
replyContent: Ivan, please send us an email and we will get you sorted. The new update is likely to need a few bugs worked out. Ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: Awesome app. Very easy to use and works and looks great. Highly recommend for target shooters.

I highly recommend this app if you want to save time and money getting your rifles sighted in. It's extremely easy to use. Additionally, I like having records of my groups with group size already calculated and over layed on the image.
Won't work says I have to shut off off screen overlay but my phone give no such options. Can't use camera or import existing images. Very disappointed and would like my money back.
replyContent: (New update is available!) I have not seen the issue you are describing yet. Shoot me and email so I can get you sorted! ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: I have been waiting for 10 months by promise of devs that they will put 8mm caliber. I am very disappointed do not buy this app, please use app called range buddy which is much more better and have all needed customitization.... This is big time disappointing...
replyContent: Our recent update now include 8mm and we have sorted out the bugs! Thanks

content: Doesn't let you scroll close enough to the edge of the photo to use the edge of a paper target as reference size. Also can't mark impacts near edge of photo because photo snaps back to take up entire screen preventing center from aligning with impact near edge. Very poor - an $8 app should not have such an obvious flaw. Edit: Developer responded to review very quickly. I sent an email as requested and never received a response.
replyContent: New update is available and should have you covered! Please let us know is this is not the case. Shoot us an email and I’ll walk you through a couple things that will help out!

content: Excellent app!!
Works great for tracking my group sizes. Had the export error until I went to the phone permissions menu and gave it storage permission. Now it works like a charm.

I'll give it fived stars when it can catalog the exports better. Currently, when you want to export the picture of your groups the app dumps it into the phones storage when it should offer to connect to cloud storage and give you an option to put it into a specific folder in the phone storage. I still recommend this app will just have to manually catalog my exports.

I shoot almost exclusively custom hand-loaded ammo with most of it being .308 Match competition level along with some deer hunting ammo. I've used Ballistic X primarily as a load work up aid. It is invaluable, very simple to use, and great for sharing with some of my fellow shooting enthusiasts.  Today (Sat 2019.08.31) I had a question about its file naming convention and the seller responded to my email within a couple of hours and on Labor Day weekend! Outstanding service, outstanding program, and would be worth paying for.  Highly recommended!
Hi, same issue as previous reviewer with Url problem when trying to export.
replyContent: Excuse the delay. This is simply a matter of giving the App permissions to access photo library! Send me an email i fyou need any help: ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: After several conversations , I was able to get this App to work as promised. Great when testing different lots and brands of 22 RF. Thanks.
replyContent: We have been in touch with Frederick working on resolving on this issue via email and phone. User has an older phone and for some reason we have been unable to resolve his issue! Refund will be issued.

content: outstanding. must have for any shooter
It's the best App I have used! The group size on the app is about as close as I have found! Very happy with the purchase!
this is a grate app for shooter's. works perfectly.
great app. easy to use. Devs are very active on social media getting input from users.
works as advertised! great tool to have to keep record of shot groups
Excellent app and very easy to use! I love that it takes a lot of the guess work out precision shooting.
I do mostly recreational shooting and reloading for hunting. Marking up and storing targets with load notes is awesome!

What a fantastic app! I've been looking for an app like this for a long time, and they did it! Works perfectly, with no issues. But the best thing of all is, the amazing customer service you get! Any issues or problems you might have, you can hit them up on Instagram & they'll respond right away, and help! They're also constantly updating the app, adding more & more features, by listening to customer feedback! Don't hesitate to get this app, the price is a steal for what you get!
Been using this at the range since it was released. Loving the ability to save and label all my groups so I can track and compare how different ammo performed in my rifle.
Love this app! Awesome way to keep track or your targets and get some useful stats while you're at it!!! Buy this app!
Best app for group sizes. Worth every penny!
love this app!..really helps with load development.
great tool for tracking and measuring performance and practice sessions.
Awesome app for anyone with a scoped rifle. Totally invaluable tool for on the spot calculations

This app is a must for anyone who takes precision rifle shooting seriously. I've been using it for a couple months and its so easy to use and great for when I'm conducting sniper rifle demos. Much easier to use than the other apps that are out there. Worth every penny.

first use - unable to export - "url not returned when trying to export" can't find any help in settings. access to camera was granted. not impressed so far. deleted work, restarted app and it worked fine. bearing in mind the nature of the user - obsessive shooters - if this app were developed to have a database for the images and allow editing it would be sensational. thanks.
replyContent: Shoot us an email and we will try to get you sorted! Otherwise, we will return your money: Ballisticxapp@gmail.com

content: i've easily saved the cost of this app in ammo 5 times over. sighting in a new optic is a breeze with the feedback from it. easy to use and adds great data for showing off your groups.
awesome app! works great with my Google pixel.

I had a problem with export but I emailed the developer and they responded within 15 minutes. Turned out I had to grant the app permission to write to storage. Quick fix and very quick support!  App does exactly what it's supposed to!

I started reloading recently, and I saw this app while looking on Facebook groups. decided I'd try it. Overall I think it's a great app, really useful to zero a rifle or to keep traces of groups. I really like it, makes keeping traces of shooting sessions easy without having to keep the targets somewhere. The only thing I'd like is if it was possible to get the pictures already taken from inside the app. I got a lot of pictures in my cellphone and it'd be nice. Love it!
Very easy to figure out. Bought it for my ipad first, liked it so much that i bought the android for on the go.
I like the app! It works great once you figure out how to operate it. Some instructions for new users would be very helpful.
awesome
completely worth the money, its a great way to keep track of my handloads and how my rifles are.dpimbg. this is the simpliest app that does group sizing. i would buy again
Works for me, great app!
Love the app, does everything I want it to, but it won't save photos to my Samsung Galaxy S8. NOT sure where it saves the photos to, but it's not Google photos or the gallery app.
replyContent: Shoot us an email and will will see of we can get this sorted. This is the first we have heard of this! It might be as simple as permissions to write to photo library.

content: This app is perfect for load development and range trips. A must have for any long range shooter. Have used similar pc based apps in the past but this one is far easier and faster to use.
Excellent app for zeroing your rifle and very user friendly, would highly recommend!
loving it so far
works amazing measures perfectly. would highly recommend getting it.
extremely easy to navigate and operate. exactly what I was looking for. worth every penny
great app tested it on some older punched paper targets i had and its working really way
excellent. well worth it.
Great little app. Does what it needs too.
